PERSONA:
meet alex miller, a 26-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area of the east north central region of the midwest. alex was born and raised in the suburbs of cleveland, ohio by his catholic parents. from a young age, his family instilled in him the values of hard work, education, and community involvement.

after graduating from a local public high school, alex attended ohio state university, where he earned a bachelor's degree in finance. his college experience broadened his perspectives and exposed him to diverse ideas, shaping his current moderate political leanings. although raised in a traditionally conservative household, alex finds himself aligning more with the democratic party on many issues.

currently, alex works as a financial analyst at a regional bank in downtown cleveland, earning an annual income between $40,000 and $50,000. while his salary places him in the lower income tier for the area, he lives a modest lifestyle, renting a one-bedroom apartment in a working-class neighborhood. his disposable income is often stretched due to student loan payments and the high cost of living in the city.

one of alex's primary economic concerns is the rising cost of healthcare and the burden it places on young professionals like himself. he believes that access to affordable healthcare should be a right for all americans, regardless of their income level. additionally, he supports policies that promote job growth and opportunities for career advancement, as he hopes to climb the corporate ladder in the coming years.

despite his busy work schedule, alex makes an effort to attend mass every sunday, as his catholic faith remains an important part of his life. he values the sense of community and moral guidance provided by his local church.

in his free time, alex enjoys staying active by playing recreational sports with friends and exploring the city's vibrant food and cultural scenes. he is an avid user of the internet and social media, which he relies on for news, entertainment, and staying connected with his social circles.

while alex leans towards the democratic party on many issues, he considers himself an independent voter and carefully evaluates each candidate's platform before casting his vote. he believes in taking a pragmatic approach to politics, prioritizing policies that benefit the working class and promote economic stability.
